name: BARCA
description:
MES QUE UN CLUB - "more than a club" - official slogan of club FC Barcelona.

BARCA!! BARCA!! home of the worlds greatest present and former players, Barcelona is the epitome of football royalty. They have reinvented the game and have set the standard higher for every team attempting to relinquish it's crown. Mes Que un Club, more than a club is the slogan that Barca and its' fans abide by. As a Barca fan you live breathe and reference anything and everyone to your great club.

This American Apparel tee is Navy Blue with a rich deep red print of the club's slogan blazed across the chest in a stitched on graphic style. The back has the nummerzehn logo and slogan "Totally Unconditionally Partisan" printed in matching red near the top.

Mes Que un Club!

name: BAYERN
description:
MIA SAN MIA - "we are who we are" - official slogan of club FC Bayern Munchen.

Bayern Munich is Germany's most recognizable and powerful club. They belong to the upper echelons of european football heavyweights. Boasting some of the greatest names over the years they are a proud and haughty people. The Bavarians bring the fear and demand respect across Europe and the World.

Mia San Mia... is the cry that echoes throughout the stadium whenever Die Roten take the field. This tee houses the famous chant front and center for all to see on a deep rich America Apparel red tee.

name: ARSENAL
description:
VICTORY THOUGH HARMONY- official slogan of club Arsenal of London.

The Gunners of England, they bring the style and the panache. Home of some of world football's greatest talents present and past. Arsenal bring a unique brand and elegance matched only by the passion of their ardent fans. A true European heavyweight in every sense of the word, Arsenal represents for thousand and millions of fans worldwide. They live their slogan "Victory through Harmony" and it is because of this token line of thought that their fans have a special affiliation with the club.

This white and red ringer tee captures the slogan across the chest in majestic form and grace. 100% cotton from Gildan, it is slim fitting and comes in all sizes

name: CHELSEA
description:
STRIVE FOR VICTORY SHUN DEFEAT - official slogan of Chelsea football club of London.

The aristocrats of English football and the envy on all of London. The blue side of London is represented by the power and steel of the mighty lions of Chelsea. The warriors of Stamford bridge create history locally and throughout Europe every time they enter the field. Everywhere they go, they are feared and loathed in equal measure, and everywhere they go success follows. 

The mantra "Strive for Victory shun Defeat" echoes throughout London and is front and center on this 100% cotton slim fitting ringer tee. This is Chelsea, this is the pride of London the pride of England!

name: ARGENTINA
description:
True football royalty. Known the world over by their sky blue stripes the Albiceleste is passion personified. 

This grungy print on a deep rich navy blue totally brings out the feeling of dark alleys and that vibe of being somewhere only the locals are welcome. Argentine football is real football, rung in by a chorus of chants "ARGENTINA, ARGENTINA!!!!" and blue and white confetti streaming down from the rafters of all the local stadiums. 

Giving off a real aura of arrogance and self worth this tshirt has the "Albiceleste" nickname and iconic sun graphic in sky blue brazened across the chest. The NummerZehn logo lives on a patch hand stitched to the back of the tshirt.

The tshirt itself is ultra light and soft 50% polyester and 50% cotton premium American Apparel tshirt.

name: BRAZIL
description:
The Selecao, Canarinho, Verde-Amarela, Samba Boys, Pentacampe√µes.

From the favelas to the cities and the beaches, the Selecao is more than a football team. It transcends boundaries and brings life. The drums, the people, the passion, the entertainment, this is Brazil. 

An open winged Macaw in yellow on a royal blue heather tshirt, this print highlights the jovial nature of all that A Selecao represents. Style. Color. Joy. Football.

This tshirt is a premium 50% polyester and 50% cotton American Apparel Crew neck heather, it is ultra light and ultra soft, with NummerZehn logo patch living hand stitched on the back towards the neck.

name: ENGLAND
description:
A conceived notion of greatness and pride of the Three Lions is only reflected by the haughtiness of its fanatics. Fans of the Three Lions bleed for their crest. From Manchester to London and Liverpool to the dark streets of Tyneside, the Three Lions represent from all corners of England and worldwide.

The Three Lions tshirt captures this pride in a bold deep red/maroon heather tee, with the Three Lions graphic living in black proudly on the chest. Tshirt also comes in gray.

Tshirt is a premium heather poly/cotton blend. 50% polyester and 50% cotton. It is Ultra soft and ultra light, with NummerZehn logo hand stitched towards the back of the base of the neck.

name: FRANCE
description:
The cries of "Allez les blues!!!" ring proud and true in this design. The French team divides opinion but one thing remains true they bring the excitement, the drama, the attitude and the real fanatics will have it no other way. 

The iconic mascot, the rooster, stands proud and firm on this tshirt. The design is simple and bold, with the text graphic in a very loose artistic style that reflects what the French game is all about; multicultural, multi faceted and full of bravado.

The tshirt is a deep, dark, navy blue, with the graphic printed in white. Made from a premium blend 50% polyester, 50% cotton American Apparel crew neck tshirt. It is ultra light and ultra soft. The NummerZehn patch is hand stitched towards the back of the tshirt.

name: GERMANY
description:
Efficiency, power and an unnerving degree of arrogance. This is Die Mannschaft.

Inspiring a never say die spirit and a superiority complex as long as the Autobahn, Die Mannschaft are revered and feared the world over. 

From the jumping terraces of the Signal Iduna Park to the haunting, surreal, tense atmospheres of the Alliance Arena, all German fanatics unite in their unrelenting support for the national team. They bring the momentum while Die Mannschaft bring the steel.

The Die Mannschaft thsirt offers a white stunted graphic on black. The tshirt itself is made of 50% poly and 50% cotton and are premium American Apparel crew neck garments. The NummerZehn patch is hand stitched on a patch towards the back. The tshirt also comes in a charcoal gray heather. It is ultra soft and ultra light.

name: NETHERLANDS
description:
To be a fan of the Dutch is to scale the highest highs and suffer the lowest lows, never doubting for once where your loyalty lies.

It takes someone with that special extra, that someone who appreciates an aesthetic from generation to generation to really be a fanatic of the Netherlands. the illuminate any audience with a brand as bright as their orange suggest. They are flair and entertainment personified. 

The graphic stays true to what entails the Dutch, many individuals but as a collective they are immense. The Oranje sits boldly front and center with a lion graphic paying ode to their crest.

This tshirt is a premium 50% polyester and 50% cotton American Apparel Crew neck heather, it is ultra light and ultra soft, with NummerZehn logo patch living hand stitched on the back towards the neck.

name: ITALY
description:
The Azzurri are made of much sterner stuff than mere mortals, they grind and they toil, a work ethic rivaled by few. They are 4 time world champions and are respected, feared and hated in equal measure wherever they go. 

From the streets of Rome to the canals of Venice, italian football is always larger than life, and so is the exalted demeanor of its fanatics, they know one thing and one thing alone, how to get the job done. The will bleed for the red, white and green and few could match their passion and undying loyalty. the Azzurri is a different breed of fanatic.

Bold and brash is what italy is all about and no better way to pledge allegiance than bold and brash front and center. Azzurri graphic lives huge on the front on a sea of blue.

Tshirt is a premium heather poly/cotton blend. 50% polyester and 50% cotton. It is Ultra soft and ultra light, with NummerZehn logo hand stitched towards the back of the base of the neck.

name: SPAIN
description:
La furia Roja are the true artisans of world football, and like they fans have positioned them selves as true kings of the beautiful game. Spanish fans cross the madrid and barca divide to accept their superiority amongst all things football. On the back of a huge superiority complex them hold themselves in the highest regard. To be the best you have to beat the best, and the Spaniards are the best. 

La furia roja graphic speaks for itself, using the iconic bull draws reference to the "ole" and dizzying possession that sets the rafters alight. Spain has changed the world game, and Spanish fans see success as a matter of principle and a divine right for what they have given to the sport. La Furia Roja is here to stay.

The tshirt is a deep, blood red, with the graphic printed in yellow. Made from a premium blend 50% polyester, 50% cotton American Apparel crew neck tshirt. It is ultra light and ultra soft. The NummerZehn patch is hand stitched towards the back of the tshirt.

name: GERMANY gray
description:
Efficiency, power and an unnerving degree of arrogance. This is Die Mannschaft.

Inspiring a never say die spirit and a superiority complex as long as the Autobahn, Die Mannschaft are revered and feared the world over.

From the jumping terraces of the Signal Iduna Park to the haunting, surreal, tense atmospheres of the Alliance Arena, all German fanatics unite in their unrelenting support for the national team. They bring the momentum while Die Mannschaft bring the steel.

The Die Mannschaft thsirt offers a white stunted graphic on black. The tshirt itself is made of 50% poly and 50% cotton and are premium American Apparel crew neck garments. The NummerZehn patch is hand stitched on a patch towards the back. The tshirt also comes in a deep black. It is ultra soft and ultra light.

name: SPAIN 2
description:
Simply put - The Greatest National Football Team Ever - La Furia Roja! 
Like the matador in the arena, the spanish dictate and lead the opposition into total disarray then pummel with the ferocity of the raging bull. 

OLE!! OLE!! are the chants that follow every inch perfect intricate pass or action of this record breaking unit. They have set the standard, they are the benchmark... now the others must lift their game.

This tee pays homage with deep blue bull head graphic with the GREATEST EVER knocked out of the bull head.
